rule: Sunlight is harmful and you must avoid it.

dialogues.AniD1: The blinding sun rules this desert like a tyrant, only in the night are we free from her scorching rays.
dialogues.AniD2: The night is a time of peace, divinity may be found in a tranquil evening.
dialogues.AniD3: Those who worship the sun cannot even gaze upon her face without being blinded, the moon is a kinder god
dialogues.AniD4: Shadow and shade, coolness and tranquility, the night time... is the right time.
